group_1.textCenter: (I'll stay in my room for a while.)

group_1.narration: I tried to calm down in my room.
But all I could think of was awful things@happening to Leila and Mito.

group_1.textCenter: (I didn't have any desire to call Mito in@all that time.)
(I'm hopeless... I'm too afraid to do@anything.)

group_1.narration: I just huddled in my room, hugging my knees.
And I gave up on even trying to@interact with Leila and Mito.
I should just stop trying to get involved@with other people, and just fight Witches.
What life I have left in my Soul Gem@is only good for fighting Witches.@Nothing more...
